specialization.title: Specialization:
specialization.data: development of WEB applications of various levels of complexity

frontend.title: Front-end:
frontend.data: JavaScript ES6, VueJs, ExtJs, Backbone, ElectronJs, sass, less

infoclinicaRu.title: INFOCLINICA.RU
infoclinicaRu.text:
INFOCLINICA.RU - integrated SaaS solution for organizing an electronic registry website and a patient’s personal account of the clinic.
The service allows you to organize an independent recording of the patient's appointment, viewing and printing by the patient a list of scheduled visits, results of analyzes and recommendations of the doctor.

labportal.title: Labportal
labportal.text:
Laboratory data exchange service between clinics and laboratories.
Centralized support of reference books and preanalytical rules of leading laboratories.
Registration of orders to the laboratory remotely via a convenient web-based interface.

misInfoclinica.title: WEB Infoclinica
misInfoclinica.text:
Infoclinic's medical information system is the basis for building a single, well-structured clinic information space.
The functionality of the system covers all areas of activity of a modern medical institution, wide integration capabilities provide exchange with other information systems used both in the clinic and outside it, as well as use various communication channels with patients.

ccAlfatell.title: Contact Center Alfatell
ccAlfatell.text: AlfaTell Contact Center is a software and hardware solution that allows you to build a full-fledged corporate telephone network with a single plan of city short internal numbers with minimal financial costs. The service allows you to get the full range of functions of a modern office PBX that processes large flows of incoming and outgoing phone calls, as well as information received by E-mail, SMS, FAX.

visualControl.title: Visual Control
visualControl.text: A service that allows you to organize video monitoring of any scale using any type of ip, web camera, without the use of special hardware systems (video recorder).

terminal.title: Self-service terminal
terminal.text:
A solution that allows a medical clinic to receive information about a patient’s visit.
The service is implemented as terminal software installed at the entrance to a medical clinic.

projects.otherProjectInfo: This list contains the most difficult projects in my opinion. Besides them, I also took part in various positions in the development of server applications, web sites, both self-written and CMS ...
